roadmap-nodes.title: Hello Quantum
roadmap-nodes.description: This lab will lay the foundation for using Qiskit and learning about the Gate Model in quantum computing. Participants will start with basic concepts in Quantum Information and Python programming.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Lay a foundation for using Qiskit and learning Gate Model of Quantum Computation

roadmap-nodes.title: Hello Quantum
roadmap-nodes.description: This lab will lay the foundation for using Qiskit and learning about the Gate Model in quantum computing. Participants will start with basic concepts in Quantum Information and Python programming.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Lay a foundation for using Qiskit and learning Gate Model of Quantum Computation

roadmap-nodes.title: Intro to Circuits
roadmap-nodes.description: This lab will lay the foundation for using Qiskit and learning about the Gate Model in quantum computing. Participants will start with basic concepts in Quantum Information and Python programming.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Understand the basics of quantum information theory

roadmap-nodes.title: A Deeper Look at Circuits
roadmap-nodes.description: The lab will delve deeper into Quantum Circuits and the Gate Model. It aims to build a solid foundation in Quantum Gate Model and the practical use of Quantum Circuits.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Build a foundation in Quantum Gate Model and Using Quantum Circuits

roadmap-nodes.title: Intro to Gate Model
roadmap-nodes.description: This lab is about building Quantum Circuits using the Quantum Gate Model. It will cover the Gate Model, Logic Gates, and Quantum Information.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Building Quantum Circuits using the Quantum Gate Model

roadmap-nodes.title: A Deeper Look at the Gate Model
roadmap-nodes.description: The focus here is to understand the gate model and its applications, including Logic Gates, Boolean Expressions, Quantum Information, and Dynamic Circuits.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Understand the gate model and it’s applications

roadmap-nodes.title: Beginning Quantum Algorithms
roadmap-nodes.description: This lab introduces entangled qubit pairs and lays a foundation for understanding quantum algorithms. It will cover the Gate Model, Quantum Algorithms, and Bell’s States.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Introduce entangled qubit pairs and how entanglement is used in quantum algorithms

roadmap-nodes.title: Quantum Algorithms and Use Cases
roadmap-nodes.description: This lab focuses on understanding how quantum teleportation is implemented and the algorithms it leverages.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Understand how quantum teleportation is implemented and the broader implications of the algorithm

roadmap-nodes.title: Implementing Quantum Algorithms
roadmap-nodes.description: Introduces Dynamic Circuits and famous quantum algorithms like Shor’s and Grover’s Algorithms, along with their applications.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Introduce Dynamic Circuits, Introduce a Famous quantum algorithm and understand it’s applications

roadmap-nodes.title: Intro to Error Correction
roadmap-nodes.description: The lab introduces quantum errors and explores how they can be corrected in hardware and software.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Introduce Quantum Errors and explore ways to properly handle errors

roadmap-nodes.title: Mitigation, Correction, and Suppression
roadmap-nodes.description: A deeper look into Quantum Errors, understanding the difference between error mitigation, error correction, and error suppression.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: A deeper look into Quantum Errors. Understand the difference between error mitigation, error correction, and error suppression

roadmap-nodes.title: Designing Quantum Circuits
roadmap-nodes.description: Focuses on learning how to design and develop a quantum circuit.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Learn how to design and develop a quantum circuit

roadmap-nodes.title: Algorithm Creation I
roadmap-nodes.description: Covers the basics of Quantum Algorithm Creation.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Learn the basics of Quantum Algorithm Creation

roadmap-nodes.title: Algorithm Creation II
roadmap-nodes.description: Continues with Quantum Algorithm Design and Development.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Look into Quantum Algorithm Design and Development

roadmap-nodes.title: Quantum Application Design
roadmap-nodes.description: Design an Open Source Quantum Algorithm - Development Summary I.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Develop an Open Source Quantum Algorithm

roadmap-nodes.title: Quantum Application Development I
roadmap-nodes.description: Continues the development of an Open Source Quantum Algorithm - Development Summary II.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Develop an Open Source Quantum Algorithm

roadmap-nodes.title: Quantum Application Development II
roadmap-nodes.description: Finalizes the development of an Open Source Quantum Algorithm - Development Summary III.
roadmap-nodes.purpose: Develop an Open Source Quantum Algorithm

research-nodes.title: Wireless Network Relay Selection: Utilizing a Quantum Algorithm
research-nodes.authors: Tanner Kocher, Sam Braude, Dr. Krishna Ramamoorthy

research-nodes.title: Wireless Network Relay Selection: Utilizing a Quantum Algorithm
